text: Tomáš Galásek (born 15 January 1973) is a former Czech football player. He has played for the Czech Republic national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Division Apps Goals Baník Ostrava 1991–92 First League 10 0 1992–93 30 1 1993–94 Gambrinus liga 30 0 1994–95 25 3 1995–96 26 5 Total 121 9 Willem II 1996–97 Eredivisie 16 0 1997–98 31 3 1998–99 32 5 1999–00 31 3 Total 110 11 Ajax 2000–01 Eredivisie 33 8 2001–02 23 1 2002–03 30 5 2003–04 29 4 2004–05 13 2 2005–06 26 4 Total 154 24 1\.
